responsibilities: Architect and develop simulation tools to understand subsea product performance in various scenarios.
Develop and implement hydrodynamic modeling and simulation capabilities for data capture during testing.
Rapidly iterate on modeling and simulation capabilities during test periods, collaborating with the GNC team.
Simulate and test data analysis tools and processes.
Create test and simulation fixtures for software- and hardware-in-the-loop operations.
Work with multi-disciplinary subject matter experts to model sub-system, system, and system of system dynamics.
Collaborate with internal and external customers to understand simulation requirements and develop efficient solutions.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on developing simulation tools, hydrodynamic modeling, and collaborating with teams to understand and simulate subsea product performance. There is no mention of working with language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with engineering and simulation rather than language model customization.
